pullRequest.title: GroundItems: Keep item lists in input order
pullRequest.bodyText:
Highlighted and Hidden item lists currently become unordered when the lists are updated. This changes HashSets to ArrayLists to avoid this.
Duplicates in the lists will no longer be removed but since they can only happen by manually adding something to the list twice, it's not a huge issue.

commit.message: GroundItems: Keep item lists in input order

beforeCommit.message:
Apply suggestions from code review

Co-Authored-By: Jordan <Nightfirecat@users.noreply.github.com>

afterCommit.message: GroundItems: Keep item lists in input order
